title: First
author: Matt Krupa
content: Hello, I have just made this blog and this is the first post here to be created. I really want to go offline. I don't want to feed data brokers and AI bots training on my personal data. So this would be the only way I can communicate with my fans at one point... Gonna figure out how my fans can communicate with me now. First step would be getting them lmao.

title: New single: Little Light
author: Matt Krupa
content: New single 'Little Light' is out now on all streaming platforms. This is the beginning of the last chapter. Go listen NOW.

title: Little Light music video
author: Matt Krupa
content: Go watch the Little Light video!
